medical_history.chief_complaint: Obesity, intellectual disability, and dysmorphism in a 15-year-old girl.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The family reported an increase in weight gain starting from 3 months of age. By 6 years and 2 months, her weight was 38.7 kg with a BMI of 24.4 kg/m2. At 16 years and 5 months, her weight increased to 129.4 kg with a BMI of 52.83 kg/m2. Developmental milestones were normal, with menarche occurring at 12 years and 8 months with irregular cycles. Insulin resistance was revealed following an oral glucose tolerance test.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No history of failure to thrive in infancy or respiratory insufficiency. Previous diagnosis of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.
medical_history.family_history: The parents are second cousins; no specific hereditary conditions mentioned.
medical_history.social_history: Patient was noncompliant with metformin treatment for insulin resistance. No other social history provided.
